name: @bbp/morphoviewer
description: Class to display SWC morphology files in 3D

scripts.ci: cd lib && npm install && npm run build
scripts.minor: npm version minor -no-git-tag-version --force && cd lib && npm version minor -no-git-tag-version --force && cd ../app && npm version minor -no-git-tag-version --force
scripts.patch: npm version patch -no-git-tag-version --force && cd lib && npm version patch -no-git-tag-version --force && cd ../app && npm version patch -no-git-tag-version --force

author: Fabien PETITJEAN <fabien.petitjean@epfl.ch>
